ingredients.ingredient: 1 (5 1/2 pound) boneless leg of lamb, tied in netting
20 cloves garlic, or more to taste

cookingTips: Create slits in the lamb and insert garlic cloves and rosemary sprigs for flavor throughout.
Roast at 400°F for medium-rare (160°F internal temperature), about 20 minutes per pound.
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can garlic and rosemary infuse a large roast with deep, aromatic flavor?
